scripts.lint:all: run-p --silent --continue-on-error lint:eslint lint:typescript lint:prettier && echo No linting or compiler errors found!
scripts.lint: npm run --silent lint:all || { echo 'Code linting failed! Formatting errors can be fixed by running "npm run format"' && exit 1; }
scripts.format:eslint: npm run --silent lint:eslint -- --fix && echo 'All files now match eslint rules!'
scripts.pre-commit:script: npm run --silent lint || { echo 'pre-commit script failed, fix errors or use "--no-verify" to bypass' && exit 1; }
